result: A) Guarantees equality between people.Text I Electronic Mural Project developed in the int, similar to a totem, promises to make access to information available for all the inclusion of people with disabilities has been one of the main challenges and concerns for society over the last decades. And the use of technology has proved to be a key ally in many initiatives focused on this area. An example of this is one of the recent creations of the National Technology Institute (INT) - Research Unit of the Ministry of Science, Technology, Innovations and Communications (MCTIC). There, with the objective that differences between people are not synonymous with obstacles in access to information or communication, engineers and technologists have been working on the development of the electronic mural.
